def_cn: 不友善的；不友好的；没好气的
def_en: If someone is unwelcoming, or if they behave in an unwelcoming way, they are unfriendly or hostile when you visit or approach them.

def_cn: （地方）不好看的，不适合居住（或工作）的
def_en: If you describe a place as unwelcoming, you mean that it looks unattractive or difficult to live or work in.
